thread.title: Trump on spy poisoning: "Looks like the Russians were behind it"

title: Trump on spy poisoning: "Looks like the Russians were behind it"
text:
Trump on spy poisoning: "Looks like the Russians were behind it" Thursday, March 15, 2018 - 00:25 
President Trump says it ''certainly looks like the Russians were behind'' the military-grade nerve toxin attack on a former Russian double agent in England. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
President Trump says it "certainly looks like the Russians were behind" the military-grade nerve toxin attack on a former Russian double agent in England. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2ItkVqP
